data.title: Full roster for NBA Playgrounds
data.meta_description: Developer Saber Interactive has revealed the entire NBA Playgrounds roster through Gamespot which is made up of 44 players from the league's past and 3-6 players representing each team. I've broken that complete list out into the legends and for the current players with their respective teams. Surprisingly there are some great present day players that
data.text:
Developer Saber Interactive has revealed the entire NBA Playgrounds roster through Gamespot which is made up of 44 players from the league’s past and 3-6 players representing each team. I’ve broken that complete list out into the legends and for the current players with their respective teams.

Surprisingly there are some great present day players that have been left off the game including Isaiah Thomas, Klay Thompson, Giannis Antetokounmpo, and Kemba Walker. A tweet from the company makes it sound like the roster will be expanding, but it’s not clear why these players may have been omitted in the first place and if they’ll be among those added at a later date. NBA Playgrounds will release in May for $20 on PS4, XB1, PC, and Switch.
